header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our programs and policies.

howToEnroll.question: How do I enroll my child at Newton School?
howToEnroll.answer: You can enroll by scheduling a consultation through our contact page or by calling us directly. We'll arrange a level assessment test and discuss the best program options for your child.

ageRequirement.question: What age groups do you accept?
ageRequirement.answer: We accept students from elementary school through high school. Our programs are tailored to different age groups and academic levels.

trialClass.question: Do you offer trial classes?
trialClass.answer: Yes, we offer a complimentary trial class so students can experience our teaching style before committing. Contact us to schedule your trial session.

classSize.question: What is the class size?
classSize.answer: We maintain small class sizes with a maximum of 8 students per class to ensure personalized attention and effective learning.

classSchedule.question: What are the class schedules?
classSchedule.answer: Classes are held Monday through Friday from 3PM to 9PM and Saturdays from 10AM to 6PM. Specific times vary by program and level.

makeupClass.question: Can I make up a missed class?
makeupClass.answer: Yes, makeup classes are available if you notify us at least 24 hours in advance. Please contact our office to reschedule.

subjects.question: What subjects do you teach?
subjects.answer: We offer comprehensive programs in Mathematics, Science (Biology, Chemistry, Physics), English, and Test Prep (SAT, ACT, AP exams).

levelTest.question: Is there a placement test?
levelTest.answer: Yes, all new students take a diagnostic assessment to determine their current level and learning needs. This helps us place them in the most appropriate class.

homework.question: How much homework is assigned?
homework.answer: Homework is assigned after each class to reinforce learning. The amount varies by subject and level, typically taking 30-60 minutes per subject.

tuition.question: What is the tuition fee?
tuition.answer: Tuition varies by program and number of subjects. Please contact us for detailed pricing information and current promotions.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept cash, check, and all major credit cards. Monthly payment plans are available for your convenience.

refund.question: What is the refund policy?
refund.answer: Refunds are available within the first week of enrollment. After the first week, tuition is non-refundable but can be applied to future terms.

stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
stillHaveQuestions.subtitle: Our team is here to help. Contact us and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
